page.title: 09Transport.
page.content: Transport facilities in the local area are of an excellent standard. The busses and trains run frequently and efficiently. the routs are vaired and even the small backstreets are covered by at least one bus per hour. The husses and trains run all over the country from this area, and the prices are very good. They are considered to be the cheapest rates in the whole of England. There are no bus stations in the area, but there is one at Rotherham only a short distance away, and there is a very well rquiped train station at mexborough.
